headline: Micron Introduces World’s Fastest, Most Energy Efficient 60TB SSD
summary: The industry’s first E3.S 60TB SSD, the Micron ION 6550 delivers best-in-class energy efficiency at up to 67% more density per rack for exascale data centers Micron 6550 ION E3.S SSD The Micron 6550 ION E3.S SSD is the industry's first E3.S and PCIe Gen5 60TB SSD. BOISE, Idaho, Nov. 12, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Micron Technology, Inc. (Nasdaq: MU), today announced it has begun qualification of the 6550 ION NVMe™ SSD with customers. The Micron 6550 ION is the world’s fastest 60TB data center SSD
